actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of certain potential water resource developments.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of certain potential water resource developments in the Geary project on the Canadian River in Blain and Custer Counties, Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of certain potential water resource developments.
